name: Seasons are a State of Mind
name_original: Seasons are a State of Mind
description:
Seasons are a State of Mind, by Nathaniel Gillette (walk cycle by Jillian Sander), attempts to reflect on emotional cycles by constructing a metaphor around the experience of seasonal weather.

Thanks again to Jillian Sander for the character and animation frames.

[just a quick game made for my Experimental Game Lab as an intro to 2D game design, use left and right arrow keys or 'A' + 'D' to move left and right, but mostly left].
